A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was ok. I love the new characters and the direction the story is taking them\, but the original characters are being handled poorly. That was not Luke Skywalker in this movie.  He deserved better. \"The Force Awakens\" plot line revolved around finding him\, serttinhg this movie up in a big way for something that never materialized.  So many cool possibilities lost.
